hero.title: Charles HL
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer & Data Science/AI
hero.description: Passionate developer specializing in modern web development and artificial intelligence. Freelancer and employee at Thales, I create innovative solutions that combine technology and creativity. From custom web applications to high-performance websites, I support small businesses, SMEs and large companies in their digital projects.

about.title: About me

about.description: Based in Toulouse, I am a full stack software engineer with particular expertise in artificial intelligence and data science. My passion for technology leads me to create innovative solutions both as a freelancer and as an employee at Thales.

LocaleLayout.title: Charles HL - Full Stack Web Developer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer specializing in AI and Data Science
about.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions that bridge technology and creativity. Based in Toulouse, I combine my expertise in full-stack development with advanced knowledge in artificial intelligence and data science.

personalStory.title: My Journey
personalStory.content: After graduating from a major engineering school with a comprehensive focus on AI and robotics, I've been working both as a freelancer and as an employee at Thales. This dual experience has given me a unique perspective on both entrepreneurial and enterprise-level development.

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
cta.description: Let's discuss how my experience can help bring your project to life.

thales.description: Development of web applications for managing and exploiting complex geological data and documents at TotalEnergies.
achievements: Data centralization and exploration application: Aggregation of numerous geological databases and documents with interactive mapping
Development of a digital document ordering and distribution system
Geological data submission and processing application with improvement and editing tools
Advanced technical stack: React, Node.js, Express, NestJS, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Solr, Python for Well Log extraction
Asynchronous task management with contribsys/Faktory and TypeORM

freelance.description: Providing custom web solutions for various companies, from startups to established businesses.
achievements: Specialized in robotic equipment management systems
Built end-to-end solutions from backend APIs to responsive frontends

sopra.description: Multifaceted experience at Sopra Steria including Full Stack development, AI and Data Science for Airbus Navblue and Thales Alenia Space.
achievements: Developed real-time web interfaces with WebSocket and API for Thales Alenia Space (Angular, Java, OpenAPI)
Development and maintenance of critical aerospace software (Java, AngularJS, Hibernate, SQL)
Implemented reinforcement learning methods for robotic arm trajectory optimization
Developed chatbot using automatic natural language processing techniques
Machine Learning and data visualization for Thales Alenia Space
Research in AI explainability (XAI) with ANITI and Adagos for Airbus
Full Stack Engineer for Airbus Navblue using C#, ArcGIS, Vue.js
